segments.text: I have a problem with my cable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My cable has been out for the past week or so .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cable is down right now . I am very sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will it be working again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should be back on in the next couple of days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I still have to pay for the cable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going to give you a credit while the cable is down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , I don't have to pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not until your cable comes back on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome , and I apologize for the inconvenience .
segments.speaker: S2
